name: Rowfall
description:
Are you ready for a new kind of match 3 game?
Are you bored with arranging falling pieces?
Do you want to move pieces in all 4 different directions?
You want to see and feel graphical impact?

Then you are completely right here!

In Rowfall, you don't drop individual stones or figures but a complete row consisting of 8 stones.
These stones can be up to 7 different colors or 5 special stones that will make it easier for you to sweep the board.
However, in order not to keep it too simple, there are certain events at irregular intervals which can destroy tiles, make them whirl around or totally change the controls.

The game consists of phases. In the first phase 5 rows fall down on the playing field one after the other. You can move the stones within the row to the left and right. Once the row is down, the next row falls and so on. After 5 rows the second phase begins. In this phase you can move all the stones up, down, left or right at the same time. This way you can close gaps, change the position of the stones and combine them. You can move the entire field 10 times.

If at least 3 stones of the same color are next to each other (it also counts around the corner), they explode in colorful effects. If there is a special stone right next to these exploding stones, it ignites and destroys even more stones, which can lead to breathtaking chain reactions.

Rowfall can be played in different game modes:
  • In endless play, you play until your stones reach the top. The falling speed of the rows increases from one phase to the next.
  • The point attack means that you have to try to reach a given number of points as fast as possible.
  • In the time attack mode you have only a limited amount of time to reach as many points as possible.
.
When you explode stones, a multiplier increases, increasing the points you score (each exploded stone gives one point). This multiplier is reset as soon as an action of yours does not produce a combination of stones and thus an explosion.

And now? What are you waiting for, show what you can do and enjoy Rowfall!
